== Diff ==
    - 'git diff' to see changes
    - 'git diff myfile.txt' to see diff in added files
    - 'git diff --cached' for already staged changes

== Add ==
    - 'git add -remove file.txt' unstages file

== General ==
    - 'git ls-files -t' show tracked files
    - 'git ls-files --others' show untracked files
    - 'git ls-files --others -i --exclude-standard' show all ignored files
